Update HTML, CSS, and JS as needed for the `product-summary` component.

h3. Acceptance Criteria
h4. Admin
- User can set image aspect ratio
- User can manage badges
  - Max number
  - Days for product to be classified as "new"
  - UI position
  - Horizontal or stacked layout
- User can manage price display
  - For products with multiple prices, display as range or lowest only, and specific a prefix (ex: "from $...")
  - If on sale, toggle display of amount off, and whether it's a dollar amount or percentage
  - Set a threshold for when to stop showing the amount off
- User can toggle showing the product's 2nd image on hover
- User can toggle "quick add" functionality
h4. Storefront
- Match design

h3. Technical Details
- Depending on order of work, this component may already be complete.
